title: Jubilee Veto â€” Player Veto System for WFRP4e
description: A thematic player veto system for Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay 4e. Players can call a Jubilee vote to veto an idea or course of action. Once 3 or more votes are cast, the veto is declared and the system resets. Styled to fit the grim and perilous Old World aesthetic.
